V

viewAndManageHospitalStaff() - Method in class hms.Administrator
viewAndManageHospitalStaff method is to display the menu of the Administrator
viewAndManageMedicalInventory() - Method in class hms.Administrator
viewAndManageMedicalInventory is to display the menu of medical inventory management, where administrators can view inventory, add medication, update medication quantity, remove medication, and update low stock level alert
viewAppointmentDetails() - Method in class hms.Administrator
viewAppointmentDetails method displays the real-time updates of scheduled appointments Appointment details includes: doctorID, patientID, appointment status, date and time of appointment and appointment outcome record
viewAppointmentRecord() - Method in class hms.Pharmacist
viewAppointmentRecord method allows pharmacists to view the appointment outcome record to fulfill medication prescription orders from doctors
viewAvailableAppointments() - Method in class hms.Patient
viewAvailableAppointments method allows patients to view available appointment slots with doctors
viewInventory() - Method in class hms.Inventory
viewInventory returns the list of medications that exists in the medication inventory
viewMedicalRecord() - Method in class hms.Patient
viewMedicalRecord method allows patient to view their medical record including, patientID, name, date of birth, gender, contact information, blood type, past diagnosis and treatments
viewMedicationInventory() - Method in class hms.Pharmacist
viewMedicationInventory method allows pharmacists to monitor the inventory of medications, including tracking stock levels
viewPastAppointmentOutcomes() - Method in class hms.Patient
viewPastAppointmentOutcomes method allows patients to view thier past appointment outcomes
viewPatientMedicalRecord() - Method in class hms.Doctor
viewPatientMedicalRecord method is to view the medical records of patients under the doctor's care
viewPersonalSchedule() - Method in class hms.Doctor
viewPersonalSchedule method allows doctors to view their personal schedule that they have set
viewScheduledAppointments() - Method in class hms.Patient
viewScheduledAppointments method allows patients to view the appointments
viewUpcomingAppointments() - Method in class hms.Doctor
viewUpcomingAppointments method allows doctor to view the list of appointments that have accepted but have yet to be completed
